original_text: Also the Levites which were the singers, all of them of Asaph, of Heman, of Jeduthun, with their sons and their brethren, being arrayed in white linen, having cymbals and psalteries and harps, stood at the east end of the altar, and with them an hundred and twenty priests sounding with trumpets:)
korean_text: 노래하는 레위 사람 아삽과 헤만과 여두둔과 그의 아들들과 형제들이 다 세마포를 입고 제단 동쪽에 서서 제금과 비파와 수금을 잡고 또 나팔 부는 제사장 백이십 명이 함께 서 있다가

sentences.original_text: Also the Levites which were the singers
all of them of Asaph, of Heman, of Jeduthun
sentences.korean_translation: 그들 모두는 아삽과 헤만과 여두둔 계열이었으며

sentences.original_text: with their sons and their brethren
having cymbals and psalteries and harps
stood at the east end of the altar
and with them an hundred and twenty priests
